title: Thorax and Lungs Exam Checklist
checklist: Introduce self and identify patient correctly.
Ensure proper draping for both supine and sitting positions.
Evaluate thoracic expansion by placing thumbs at the 10th rib.
Assess tactile fremitus on posterior thorax at minimum 4 spots per side.
Percuss posterior lung fields at minimum 4 spots per side, alternating sides.
Auscultate posterior lung fields at 4 places per side during full breath cycles.
Assess tactile fremitus on anterior thorax at minimum 3 spots per side.
Percuss anterior lung fields at minimum 3 spots per side while supine.
Auscultate anterior lung fields at 3 spots per side with full breath cycles while supine.
